title: Perma-banned for literally nothing?
body:
I don't really understand how this is a ban. I got banned for 14 days a few weeks ago for saying some really rude things in two games where i got egregiously trolled and the people intentionally fed and let us lose. I accept that. But how is THIS a PERMA BAN???? So if you guys can tell me how this is overtly negative and how I was such a horrible person in ONE game that i got permanently banned for it, please.

Edit: I know most of you don't care and think ever saying anything rude to anyone is a capital offense. But i got PERMANENTLY BANNED for ONE GAME where i got trolled by someone INTENTIONALLY FEEDING. I didnt even curse him out.

replies.body: Don't ask others to report someone. I understand your pain, but don't ask others to report someone. It literally does nothing. 1 report=100 in the eyes of a single game.

I asked them to report him because he was actively trolling. He ignored our adc fighting the top lane to LITERALLY walk right past her and use his ulti to run into the middle of 3 people top lane and intentionally die. As well as, five or so minutes before that, having his ulti up, in range, simply taking a jungle camp while I got caught. I asked them to report him because ive always been told that if more people report you, there is a more likely chance of you getting banned. Instead, he lied to the enemy team and goaded them into reporting ME somehow. So, i'm pretty sure that the more reports you get the more likely you are to get banned, considering I got permanently banned after A SINGLE GAME.

I was reported by 4 salty kids once after being told to kill myself. Moments after, I got a notification that the guy trying to get me banned got banned for telling me to kill myself. Quantity does not matter.
Yeah? Well how am I permanently banned then? I didnt tell anyone to kill themselves. I didnt even tell him what a cancerous douche-nozzle he is. I CONSTRAINED myself.

Just because you didn't use extreme words doesn't mean you didn't harass him all game for picking galio.


On top of that, asking others to report someone can also get you reported so....



your "constrained" harassment must be consistent, as this wouldn't be the first time you've been reported.

I can get reported for asking other people to report someone who has been trolling literally the entire game and cursing me out? What kind of idiotic system is that???? I love how theres NO context. So it just looks like i was constantly berrating this guy. I said VERY FEW things to him. Most of it was ABOUT HIM to other people because he NEEDS to be banned.

Two wrongs don't make a right, i'm sure you've heard of the phrase before.

It's a system used very often in life.

I'll use an example even if it's to an extreme, say someone murdered a family member, so you went to murder the person who killed your family member, you're going to jail.
K Mom. Ill go jump off the bridge with my friends too. Way to use a stupid fallacy to not really prove your point at all.

It does, i mean if you just look at it.

Committing a wrong to counter a wrong is bad. (you harassing your galio for playing galio even though he's trolling.)


I'll even lower it down a notch for ya. 


In school, if 2 kids get in a fight, doesn't matter who started it, they both get suspended.
k whatever. you guys are really dense. i hope you say "wtf bro" to someone in a game and the next thing you know you are permanently banned. I will laugh my ass off.

I mean it can happen, and if you think i'm dense because you're upset i'm speaking truth to you... then it should be obvious why you got banned.


Enjoy making a new account, or going to a new game.

So the "truth" is that, at any time, for saying anything that someone might not like, such as "you shouldnt play galio if you dont know how to play him" someone can, and WILL, be permanently banned and lose HOURS of work with no recompense for such an egregiously stupid reason. But dont worry "you hurt his feel goods" is enough of a reason to ban anyone. Why is there even a chat system? With such a subjective and unstable report and punishment system. Just remove the problem. Everyone will be offended by SOMETHING, SOMETIME. No matter what you say. Apparently the chat system has no actual purpose. And i DID say something positive. I said "care lol" as in "be careful". But whatever. All you see is me reacting to galios trolling. So im the bad guy.

If it happens consistently, it will happen... example = you.


Be upset all you want, it's not going to change anything lol

You were already on thin ice and was still toxic. It didn't matter how small it was any type of rule breaking would have given you the next tier punishment which is a permaban. You have shown the system that you cannot reform so why give you more chances?

Some will do good as other will play poorly. then you keep asking for reports which is considered harassment since you would only need to say it to keep the negativity up in the game. Especially since that is not how reports work it's basically useless to do. If he was breakin the rules keep it to yourself and report him after the game since it only takes one report to get someone reviewed.

You were negative all game. Literally nothing you said was positive. If you would have said positive things, that much negativity wouldn't have mattered. When you said you were going to report your entire team you alienated everyone, not just Galio, and that might have been the cause. I'm not saying the ban is justified, not at all. I'm just trying to let you know how I see it as a possibility.
Oh that wasnt to my team. That was to the enemy team because they were saying things like "hes lightly trolling at best" and "hes only trolling cause he says you've been flaming him"

I don't think you get the meaning of "intentional feeding" nor do you get the context of being banned for "literally nothing." More than often, there's a reason you suffer a ban and you even provided game proof of it. You made the negative environment or at the very least kept it ignited that your team and the enemy team had to burn through. And who knows how many other times you acted this negative and harassing, even in your recent games.

As others already said, you harassed and threatened to report him for inting...but was he really? Was he really throwing himself at the enemy team without any effort of a fight? Was he really 0 / ## / # < 3 with a bunch of concentrated deaths in one or two parts of the map? **That** is more believable intentional feeding. Reporting for playing a champ without experience or "trolling?" Doesn't exist as an option.  Players should feel comfortable to play what they want but that's often not the best circumstance and it's unfortunate that it happens from time to time, especially in ranked and especially when a new champion/rework comes crashing in.

Sorry, but you only brought the ban upon yourself. Maybe this is a reality check if you decide to climb back up and try again.
You won't leave the jungle alone?

This is pretty sad. Thats the tamest thing ive ever seen anyone get banned for in my entire life.

Because the other side doesn't matter.  Like Rossy has been trying to explain...two wrongs don't make a right. 

At any rate, I'm going to guess that most of these permaban situations take into account everything in the chat.  They aren't just looking for that one bad word (though there are some that I would guess get you the boot)....they are looking at the overall picture.  The OP was obviously salty at Galio all game, and then started in on other team mates.

REMEMBER, no one gets permabanned for one incident.  

One thing that all of these "un permaban me plz" threads have in common is that the OP always talks A LOT.  Try playing more and chatting less.

a big problem with this system is that it takes like 100 games of toxicity before you get enough reports for your first chat restriction.  but then you are marked.  and after you are marked, 3 mildly negative games later you can be permanently banned.
